attributes.action: Whiplash injury claims fraud, penalise them
attributes.additional_details:
I read recently that one man claimed whiplash injury 4 times, once being hit by a car that reversed 3 feet back and just touched his car.
For such claimants I suggest an increase or additional cover  in insurance premium  to cover their weak necks.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
